column7:
Logics - For Insight
For Client use LE_ID
For Client Group replace LE_ID with U_PID
For Net-Zero Sector replace LE_ID with DD_Sec
View Period_Name as per CIB Actuals via Data IKU against LE_ID
View LE_ID as per CIB Actuals via Data IKU
View LE_Name as per CIB Actuals via Data IKU against LE_ID
View U_PID as per PaPM Table which is aggregated at LE_ID, U_PLOC, FoL_Loc, Period, L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code and Client_Sub_Segment level.
View U_PNAME as per PaPM Table which is aggregated at LE_ID, U_PLOC, FoL_Loc, Period, L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code and Client_Sub_Segment level.
View Ultimate_Parent_Location as per CIB Actuals via Data IKU
View FoL_Location as per CIB Actuals via Data IKU against LE_ID.
View L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code as per CIB Actuals via Data IKU and display MANAGEMENT_PRODUCT_DESC_L5 as per Product Hierarchy.
View Client_Sub_Segment as per CIB actuals via Data IKU
View DD_SEC as per PaPM Table which is aggregated at LE_ID, U_PLOC, FoL_Loc, Period, L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code and Client_Sub_Segment level.
View EUNIT as per PaPM Table which is aggregated at LE_ID, U_PLOC, FoL_Loc, Period, L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code and Client_Sub_Segment level.
View Total_Revenue_MTD as per SDG Assets  which is aggregated at Period, LE_ID, MANAGEMENT_PRODUCT_DESC_L5, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
View Non_Funded_Income_MTD as per SDG Assets  which is aggregated at Period, LE_ID, MANAGEMENT_PRODUCT_DESC_L5, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
View Net_Interest_Income_MTD as per SDG Assets  which is aggregated at Period, LE_ID, MANAGEMENT_PRODUCT_DESC_L5, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
View Total_Revenue_YTD as per SDG Assets  which is aggregated at Period, LE_ID, MANAGEMENT_PRODUCT_DESC_L5, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
View Non_Funded_Income_YTD as per SDG Assets  which is aggregated at Period, LE_ID, MANAGEMENT_PRODUCT_DESC_L5, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
View Net_Interest_Income_YTD as per SDG Assets  which is aggregated at Period, LE_ID, MANAGEMENT_PRODUCT_DESC_L5, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.

View the Average of Risk_Weighted_Asset_RWA as per SDG Assets  at Period, LE_ID, MANAGEMENT_PRODUCT_DESC_L5, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
View the sum of Rolling_Income 12M divided by Avg_RWA_12M as per SDG Assets. Average it at Period, LE_ID, L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
View Total_Revenue_YTD as per CIB Actuals  which is aggregated at Period, LE_ID, L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
View Non_Funded_Income_YTD as per CIB Actuals  which is aggregated at Period, LE_ID, L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
View Net_Interest_Income_YTD as per CIB Actuals  which is aggregated at Period, LE_ID, L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
View PE_Assets as per CIB Actuals  which is aggregated at Period, LE_ID, L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.

View the Average of Risk_Weighted_Asset_RWA as per CIB Actuals  at Period, LE_ID, L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
View the sum of Rolling_Income 12M divided by Avg_RWA_12M as per CIB Actuals. Average it at Period, LE_ID, L5_Mgt_Prod_Family_Code, Ultimate Parent Location, FoL Location Client_Sub_Segment level.
